entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:52 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Chevery

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 12:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: SW 12 km/h

entry.title: Friday: Snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow squalls ending this afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then periods of light snow. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
